https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/oM3Da0WFo9NaaJvTJ0ncae8sb4x.jpg Bert is a 13-year old boy about to start eight grade. Amira is a 13-year old girl starting the same class. Amira also happens to be the younger sister of Leila, the most popular girl in school that everyone has a crush on. Bert too. Bert sees his chance to get close to Leila by befriending Amira. When Bert finds a secret diary at the sistersâ€™ home a rollercoaster of a love story filled with emotions, cringe, betrayal and heartbreak begins. Bert's Diary
